### Introduction

Hi everyone! I'm Cynthia Liu, a 2nd year Master of Public Health candidate in Epidemiology at Columbia University's Mailman School of Public Health. 

Welcome to my page! There's a brief introduction about me, a little bit about my background, some interesting data visualizations, and some navigation links for further reading. Thanks for visiting :)
